722693f-a.title: Manhattan: Ridge Street - Rivington Street
722693f-a.text:
Ridge Street, north from Rivington, to East Houston
Street's, showing details and activities of th4s East
Side thoroughfare. Populated by immigrants, their needs
are served by the pushcart market at the curb. Note the
street car tracks in the center. These, obviously are
for horse drawn cars.
About 1905
Brown Bros., photographers
NO REPRODUCTIONS
N g 2609
722693f-a.folder: Ridge Street & Rivington Street, Manhattan, NY

722989f-a.title: Manhattan: Rivington Street - Ridge Street
722989f-a.text:
194-182 Rivington Street, adjoining and west of the N.W. corner
of Ridge Street. No. 192 is a frame house with a brick front.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 306.
CREDIT LINE IMPEEATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
